message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I'm willing to pay $850000 for it.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $875000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and give you a good deal. What do you think?
I'm glad we're able to discuss the price further, Alice. Considering your last offer, I'd like to propose $860000 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to compromise again. I'll meet you at $870000. It's a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $865000 for the product.

I'm starting to get a little concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $880000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
Considering your final offer, Alice, I would like to propose $875000 for the product.

I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I've already given you a great deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $890000, but that's my absolute limit. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
After careful consideration, I would like to propose $885000 for the product.
